title: Installer will not open
body:
Hey. 
I'm trying to install league on an older laptop of mine. I know it can run league, as it has in the past.
I've downloaded the installer, but it just doesnt open. Like, I try to open the installer, and nothing happens, as if i never tried to open the installer. Other installers work, I've checked.
I'm on windows vista.
edit: I am on Windows Vista. I can use the hextech repair tool, and figured it could maybe install league. Apparently it can't ;---;

replies.body:
Interesting, I've not heard of this issue with Vista in quite a while. I think it's possible that [this alternative installer](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/ShellInstaller/NA/LeagueofLegends_NA_Installer_9_15_2014.exe) could work for you.

Let me know if it did.
